title: Flight Simulator 2020 - Addon spotlight - Bushtalk radio updated
description:
The Bushtalk radio client has been updated. It is a huge update with a lot of benefits. It is now fully integrated within MSFS 2020 and you don't need to install Python anymore! Just put it in the community folder, restart MSFS 2020 and you are ready to use the addon.

The latest version of the client can be either downloaded from Github or from flightsim.to:
https://github.com/BushtalkRadio/BushtalkClient
